author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two groups of students from Dr. Ambedkar Government Law College Hostel clashed on Miller’s Road, Kilpauk, on Friday. The clash was a fallout of an altercation between the groups.

One student, identified as Ezhumalai, was injured, and admitted to Kilpauk Medical College and Hospital. Police said the clash broke out on Friday night.

Based on a complaint filed by Ezhumalai, the police have launched a manhunt for three students who allegedly attacked Ezhumalai.
title: Law college students clash, one injured
